_comment: This data is an early work-in-progress and contains errors. Keys with _else are produced with non-trained Stanford NLP and as such only includes capitalized words. The + designates a segment range. Produced by @michaelh at Discuss and Discover SuttaCentral forum - please get in touch! Finished code forthcoming.
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:1.13^speaker: monks from the group of six
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.2^where_before_or_ar: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.3^where_before_or_ar: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.3^who_present_before: The monks from the group of six
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24:2.11^who_mentioned_bef: people who previously gave cloth for the rainy-season robes
pli-tv-bu-vb-np24^where: Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika's Monastery
